lead_paragraph: The president said he expected to leave 8,400 American troops in Afghanistan until the end of his term. His last plan to lower the number set 5,500 as a target.

byline.contributor: Michael D. Shear contributed reporting from Washington, and Mujib Mashal and Kareem Fahim from Kabul, Afghanistan.

headline.print_headline: Obama Says He Will Slow Troop Reductions in Afghanistan
headline.main: Obama Says He Will Keep More Troops in Afghanistan Than Planned

snippet: The president said he expected to leave 8,400 American troops in Afghanistan until the end of his term. His last plan to lower the number set 5,500 as a target....
abstract: Pres Obama announces that he will slow troop withdrawal from Afghanistan, reflecting recent gains in country by Taliban; will leave 8,400 troops in country through end of his term.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
